<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/integration/network/resolve/{serieNumber}/{authorization}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get Device-Token with Serial Number & Authorization

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":false,"description":"A network token generated in your the network settings","example":"Your Network-Token","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"serieNumber","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Device Serial Number registered at TagoIO","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"authorization","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Authorization Token from the user profile","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
